case.title: Jamaican BBW looking for love again - 28
case.text:
Not sure if I'm going to have any luck here, but who knows.
I'm 28 yr old Jamaican BBW that has had her heart broken a few times and is looking for love one last time. Looking for someone to be honest and open with me. I'm very loyal to mine and am looking for the same. Race is not an issue but be between the ages of 28-45. I'm m not looking to just hook up for a one night fling, looking for something long term. If you are interested feel free to email me telling me a little about yourself. We can take it from there.
Please be drug and diseases free for I am.
